title: Connection failure: unable to connect to the PVP.net server
body: I tried to log into league but it wouldn't let me and said "Connection failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server" I have a mac with OS X version 10.8.5. Suggestions please?

replies.body: Are you guys still having this issue?  We were experiencing issues when this was posted, but it should be resolved now!

I know it's an old post but I'm still experiencing this issue, every single day the first and second time I try to log into the game, it will have a connection failure. Usually it takes either two or three times before I successfully login.

I'm on Windows 8.1 64-bit. If you need any additional information about my setup, please ask.

hello, 

if you lookup on **boards archive**, you will find thousand of similar posts for the same error, unfortunately **the problem is 2+ years old** and has **nothing** to do with your PC or connection; it wont help repairing, reinstalling and disabling ip helper as you may have read somewhere. The issue is being caused by the **Adobe Air** client that a stubborn Riot continue to use instead providing to their customers a **real game client**.

Riot doesn't even read the ticked that you will send, will just ask you to provide more informations on your system, suggest you to disable the firewall (or even uninstall it!!) or suggest you to disable portions of your system (IP Helper used to surf the web, for example) they are not really trying to resolve the issue but just hiding the real cause.

**What can we do**; in short words the only solution to RP loss / ban prevention is **stop playing the game** cause they are well aware of this problem with Adobe Air client, the problem has not been resolved in a so long time, so what makes you think that they will do now? Of course **they will not resolve it until people keep playing and paying for the game**.

**SOLUTION (?)**: This seemed to work for me, Adobe Air logs indicates that the error might be related to the market. Here are the steps that I have followed to resolve the error:

1. open the game and login
2. before doing anything else click the **Market** icon
3. wait it to load then click **Champions** tab
4. once loaded click on **Profile** icon
5. Now play a game, also in draft mode!

It is important to never start a game while you are in the market, always start from your profile.
